posts.post_content:
Have a few SL cards for sale was going to do the SL set but have decided to go back to my original plan of getting the Nashville & Memphis players in higher grade.  Not sure what happened with the SGC scans but all holders are clean.

REDUCED AGAIN 12/4/17  ADD $3 FOR SHIPPING  Check,money order or paypal f/f or add 3%

Jordan SGC 35 (2.5) $81 piedmont back  NOW $76  NOW $70
Bastain SGC 20 (1.5) $60 piedmont back  NOW $55 NOW $50
